Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-KEY-ESTABLISH.response. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.8, page 445.

Definition at line 204 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::initiatorAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that initiated key establishment.

Definition at line 224 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

bool APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::accept

This parameter indicates the response to an initiator's request to execute a keyestablishment protocol. The response shall be either:

  • TRUE = Accept,
  • FALSE = Reject.

Definition at line 230 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

bool APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::useParent

This parameter indicates if the responder's parent shall be used to forward messages between the initiator and responder devices:

  • TRUE - Use parent,
  • FALSE - Do not use parent.

Definition at line 236 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

uint8_t APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::qeu[CHALLENGE_SEQUENCE_SIZE]

Data field from received SKKE-1 command frame.

Definition at line 238 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

APS_EstablishKeyConf_t APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::confirm

Confirm primitive as a parameter of the callback function.

Definition at line 240 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

void(* APS_EstablishKeyResp_t::APS_EstablishKeyConf)(APS_EstablishKeyConf_t *conf)

Callback function pointer as a handler of corresponding confirm primitive. Must not be set to NULL.
